verses.text: After \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* returned \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w* mother \w in|strong="H3808"\w* law, Noemi \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H1245"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* \w rest|strong="H4494"\w* \w for|strong="H1245"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* provide \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w with|strong="H2545"\w* thee.

\w This|strong="H1931"\w* Booz, \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w maids|strong="H5291"\w* thou wast \w joined|strong="H0854"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* field, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w our|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H0854"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H4130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* winnoweth \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* threshingfloor.

\w Wash|strong="H7364"\w* thyself \w therefore|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* thy best \w garments|strong="H8071"\w*, \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w go|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* barnfloor: \w but|strong="H0376"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* done \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0834"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*, mark \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* sleepeth: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* thou shalt \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w lift|strong="H1540"\w* \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* clothes wherewith \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* covered towards \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* shalt \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* thyself \w down|strong="H7901"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee \w what|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w She|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* thou shalt \w command|strong="H0559"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3381"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H3381"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* barnfloor, \w and|strong="H3381"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w in|strong="H3605"\w* law \w had|strong="H0834"\w* bid \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* Booz \w had|strong="H0935"\w* \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w merry|strong="H3190"\w*, \w he|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w by|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w heap|strong="H6194"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* sheaves, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* softly \w and|strong="H0935"\w* uncovering \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*, \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* herself \w down|strong="H7901"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* midnight \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* troubled: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0376"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3671"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* art thou? \w And|strong="H3671"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w Ruth|strong="H7327"\w* thy \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*: \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* thy coverlet \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H0519"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* thou art \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w near|strong="H5921"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H1350"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* art thou \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w latter|strong="H0314"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* surpassed \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w former|strong="H7223"\w*: \w because|strong="H4480"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H1115"\w* \w followed|strong="H0310"\w* \w young|strong="H0970"\w* \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \w either|strong="H0518"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w rich|strong="H6223"\w*.

\w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thee. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwell within \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w*, \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou art \w a|strong="H3588"\w* virtuous \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H1571"\w* \w do|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* deny \w myself|strong="H0595"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* kin, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H3426"\w* \w is|strong="H3426"\w* \w another|strong="H1571"\w* nearer \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w*.

\w Rest|strong="H7901"\w* thou \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H2896"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* kindred, \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w*: \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* undoubtedly \w take|strong="H1961"\w* thee, \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth: \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H0376"\w* \w feet|strong="H4772"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* night \w was|strong="H0376"\w* \w going|strong="H0935"\w* \w off|strong="H0853"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w could|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Booz \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Beware lest \w any|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou camest hither.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* again \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Spread thy mantle, wherewith thou art covered, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w both|strong="H5921"\w* hands. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* spread \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w held|strong="H0270"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* measures \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w laid|strong="H7896"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* mother \w in|strong="H0935"\w* law; \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*: \w What|strong="H0834"\w* hast thou \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*? \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Behold \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* measures \w of|strong="H0935"\w* \w barley|strong="H8184"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w return|strong="H0935"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thy mother \w in|strong="H0935"\w* law.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* Noemi \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Wait|strong="H3427"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w end|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rest|strong="H8252"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w*.
